item.title: Security
item.description: If you intend to compile or execute Pomsky expressions on a web server or other critical infrastructure, follow this advice, so you don’t end up vulnerable to attacks. A billion laughs #The most important advice is to never compile an untrusted Pomsky expression, since doing that may make you vulnerable for denial of service attacks. item.title: Unicode properties
item.description: Pomsky supports the following kinds of Unicode properties: General categories Scripts Blocks Other boolean properties However, not all regex engines support all of them. In particular, blocks and other properties are poorly supported. Categories #Every Unicode code point is in one of the following General Categories: Letter Mark Number Punctuation Symbol Separator Other Each of these categories is subdivided into smaller categories.
